Prerequisites¶

In order to use the application, you will need these prerequisites:

Python:

It’s the application programming langage

SQLite 3:

For the database management

Sentry account:

for the log of the application

Gitlab account:

for the pipeline and versionning code

DockerHub account:

for the packaging

Render account:

for the deployement

Oc Lettings
